Description:
Develop and implement effective logistics strategies tailored to the unique demands of the food and toys sector.
Coordinate and oversee the end-to-end supply chain process, from procurement and warehousing to distribution.
Collaborate closely with retail partners, hypermarkets, and other outlets to align supply with demand.
Strategically plan transportation routes to ensure timely and cost-efficient deliveries.
Monitor inventory levels and manage stock rotation to minimize waste and ensure product freshness.
Analyze data to optimize logistics operations, track performance, and identify areas for improvement.
Manage a team of logistics professionals, fostering a culture of teamwork, growth, and excellence.
Ensure compliance with local regulations, safety standards, and quality requirements.
Develop strong relationships with suppliers, carriers, and retail partners to enhance the distribution network.
Handle and resolve any logistics-related issues or disruptions that may arise.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience in logistics management within the food and toys trading and distribution sector.
In-depth understanding of Oman's market dynamics, retail landscape, and logistics intricacies.
Strong leadership skills with a track record of managing and developing teams.
Proficiency in using logistics software, tracking systems, and data analysis tools.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with internal teams and external partners.
Problem-solving mindset with the ability to navigate challenges and find creative solutions.
Detail-oriented approach to managing inventory, tracking shipments, and ensuring accuracy.
Familiarity with regulatory requirements and compliance standards in logistics and trading.
